response.overview: Two reporters from Washington DC travel to the far east to investigate the truth about strange events that are taking place with the environment.  CAST Reed -- Dave McDonald Andy -- Drew Brown Gil Walters -- Norm Wash Hanna Lee - LInsey VanNewkirk Dr. Ross -- Paul Nandzick Mary -- Sarah Cornell Mom -- Sally Dauer Buddy -- Aiden Frank Clark Monster -- Dave McDonald Pilot -- Bob Usenick  Directed by Noah Brown Written By - Jacqueline Druga, Herb Jones. Assistant Director - Greg Staab
response.tagline: east, revelations, dinosaur, linsey, vannewkirk, druga, mcdonald, brown
response.title: Revelations of A Scaly Kind
